item.description:
I think its easier for everyone if i just stay parked in the boat launch area till its picanick time....at least you can find me...LOOK FOR THE ORANGE CONES...im going to get close to the water as i can...dont like carrieing them yaks..LOL
some can paddle with the AMC and some can paddle with anyone they want...
when its over..food tiem in the other area, this area is also central to the other activity anyway...
Ok i see a bit cooler..a bit windy..but should be pretty good...


OK if any new persons are comming GO to the boat launch area...first and fins us...
Oh forgot THA SHABOO thing is in willymantic starting about 5..maybe a plan for that...

Go To the wethersfield kayaking group meetup for further details....and rsvp there..
most are paddlers..but if you didnt indicate..i dont knowe...and no sence in looking for you in both places...
________________________________________________________________________________________


OK this is a combined meetup with my kayak group..they will be kayaking on the gret waters of the lake...

Paddling starts at 10..


There wernt enough kayaks for me..so i wanted to walk/bike the area anyway..AND HAVE A PICKANICK after the kayaking is done..
thae trickey part is the pickanick is in a different part of the place than the boat launch...pretty close though..ya pass the area on the way to the boat launch..but i have to leave my car there with the trailer..etc...can get the table and stuff as needed a bit later..

if you are a kayaker...see my inforo on the wethersfield kayaking thing..just look..im not doing everything for ya LOL..

the kayaking is supposed to go about 4 hours or so...so pickanick for them is about 3 or so...i want to bike/walk ..etc for about the same time
and meet ya at the picknick area...
the customary orange cones will be in view somewhere for you to spot..2 on the car..2 at the pickanick area...the place might have a lot of tables filled..dont know..i bring my own...
grill and stoves too..etc...

SO if you want, i see Kevin has a hike run by someone that seems to know the mountain..havent met him yet....hike the mountain then visit us..
we most likely stay till dark anyway..

IF not enough of you rsvp from this site..then i just keep the table etc in the car at the boat launch and use the launch as my center of travel...
or we can meet at the pickanick area..INDICATE below..:

Some of you are already signed up for the paddle...just say PADDLING...


RAIN CANCELS THE EVENT.. I will update as the event draws closer..and as usual my part of the trip dosent end when the thers go home...
its usually cook dinner and have a fire pit going later.



Getting There:
Mansfield Hollow Boat Launch:

From I-84, south on rte 195 (exit 68) through Storrs to Mansfield ctr (about 11 miles from 84)
Go 0.5 mile past rte 89 junction and turn left onto Bassset Bridge rd at the stoplight, should see Mansfield Hollow Park sign. (licquer store at the intersection too)
Its saturday..GET SOME..LOL
Will see a picknick area on left

For kayakers:

(the boat launch is a bit further apx 0.5 miles to the access right before the bridge on the left.)

From I-384, follow rte 6 to toward Willimantic.
6 and 66 will intersect at a light. Take a left on to 6.
Follow ths highway to the second exit, go straight (=rte633 or s. frontage rd.) it is acually a parallel to rte6 connector to rte 195,
Signs for UCONN should be there somewhere too,
Go north on rte 195 toward UCONN for about 2 miles then turn right at the onto Basset Bridge Rd, same info from here as above.

I have the blue Toyota Avalon with the kayaks on a old sailboat trailer. maybe even one kayak with a 55 horsepower motor on it and a torpedo prop...
The RedNeck Jet....runs on pure moonshine...
That will get that pesky mother in law over the dam in no time...

For users of GPS or Mapquest..
use 300 Bassetts Bridge Road, Mansfield Center, CT
for the boat launch location...
or 200 for the pickanick area...

Indicate Biking/Walking or Paddling..cant be in both places at once...
pickanick is for both later..
MAYBEES..i just think are NO'ses..and im not into picking ...ok not banking on maybees being there anyway...but i understand things are dependent on things...
so there...

oh if ya cant read that well...and ya missed stuff in da middle above..(most people say they dont read all the stuff i put in the middle)..and ya couldnt figure out what is going on at both locations..woe..you must be more stupiders than i am..

Ok summer is almost over...
the future of this site for cold weather will be fo cussing on going to dingy smelly loud bars to find your love..get outside while ya can...LOL..

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: UPDATE:Walk, Bike, Kayak, Pickanick at Mansfield Hollow/dam
